abstract: Creates a common counter name from a raw value.
overview:
## Discussion

Use of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/timestamp], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/computeKernelInvocations], or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/totalCycles] instead of creating a common counter instance yourself with this initializer.

# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a common counter name from a raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The name of a common counter as a string.

## Discussion

Use of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter] type’s static properties, such as [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/timestamp], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/computeKernelInvocations], or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounter/totalCycles] instead of creating a common counter instance yourself with this initializer.
title: init(rawValue:)
